Armor.name: Armor
Armor.description: Reduce brain damage by 4 while Rezzed. Only 1 copy Rezzed at a time. Each copy has 1 use per Netrun.

Banhammer.name: Banhammer
Banhammer.description: Deals 3d6 REZ to non-Black ICE or 2d6 Rez damage to Black ICE.

Flak.name: Flak
Flak.description: Non-Black ICE attacks against you are reduced to 0 while Rezzed. Only 1 copy may be Rezzed at a time. Each copy has 1 use per Netrun.

Hellbolt.name: Hellbolt
Hellbolt.description: 2d6 damage direct to Netrunner's Brain. Their gear catches fire if not insulated.

Nervescrub.name: Nervescrub
Nervescrub.description: Lowers a Netrunner's INT, REF, and DEX by 1d6 (min. 1) for 1 hour.

Poison Flatline.name: Poison Flatline
Poison Flatline.description: Destroys a non-Black ICE on the enemy's cyberdeck at random.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: The first successful brain damage attack from a Non-Black ICE Program is stopped. Only 1 copy may be Rezzed at a time. Each copy has 1 use per Netrun.

Superglue.name: Superglue
Superglue.description: The netrunner cannot progress further into the Local NET or safely jacking out for 1d6 rounds.1 use per netrun.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: Deals 3d6 REZ to Black ICE or 2d6 Rez damage to non-Black ICE.

Vrizzbolt.name: Vrizzbolt
Vrizzbolt.description: 1d6 damage direct to Netrunner's Brain. Lowers total net actions they can take by 1 (min. 2) on their next turn.
